page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {Sixty people were interviewed.}Of these,{14 people work in Shurdington. This is not truly representative of the whole village population.{11 work {in Cheltenham, 10 work in Gloucester, 1 works in Hatherley, a Cheltenham suburb, 1 works in Nailsworth, 6 work in various other places and 17 are retired. The{employment in Shurdington is mostly at{Marley Buildings}and the {old peoples' home}which provides shift work for women. There are{self- {employed people}based in the village running small building, plumbing, electrical and similar businesses. Many professional people travel to Cheltenham and Gloucester daily, civil servants from G.C.H.Q., teachers, bank insurance and finance company employees. Secretarial and shop floor employment is at Smiths Industries, Dowty-Rotol and I.C.I. Fibres.
